tool_description: Optimizes warehouse assignments for orders based on multiple factors including cost, delivery time, inventory levels, and warehouse capacity.

candidate_warehouses.description: List of warehouses that can fulfill the order

optimization_weights.description: Weights for [cost, speed, inventory_health, capacity] factors

priority_level.description: Order priority: low, standard, high, express

customer_tier.description: Customer tier: bronze, silver, gold, platinum

error_messages: Invalid order ID: Order ID must be a non-empty string.
No candidate warehouses: At least one candidate warehouse must be provided.
Invalid optimization weights: Must provide exactly 4 weights that sum to 1.0.
Data format error: Cost, delivery, or capacity data not in required format.
Data mismatch: Number of data entries must match number of candidate warehouses.
Invalid priority level: Must be one of: low, standard, high, express.
Invalid customer tier: Must be one of: bronze, silver, gold, platinum.
usage: Provide order_id, candidate_warehouses, optimization_weights (must sum to 1.0), and corresponding cost_data, delivery_data, and capacity_data. Optionally specify priority_level and customer_tier for enhanced optimization.

recommended_warehouse.description: Optimal warehouse ID for order fulfillment

optimization_score.description: Optimization score for the recommended warehouse

alternative_options.description: Alternative warehouse options with scores in format 'warehouse_id:score'

optimization_factors.description: Breakdown of factors contributing to the decision
